name: Holy Rooster
description:
Game:

Holy Rooster is a little quest game.

The Holy Rooster died.  As Angel you have to help some chickens on an floating island.

Gather resources, build lil buildings and awake a new holy rooster.

Controls for Keyboard and Gamepad:

Move = WASD / Left Stick

Look = Mousemovement / Right Stick

Interact = F /  Button West

Run = Shift / Left Trigger

Jump = Space / Button South

Pause menu = Escape / Start

Credits:

Builded with Unity. 

Models made in Blender.

Icons/Logos made in Illustrator/Photoshop.

Some Sounds from epidemicsounds.com

Magilou - Blender help.

Nutzuup, Hamza G, Sp1tF1re - scripting helpers.

SinjaaraLy - Audio help.

My whole class for cheering up and walk through the Semester with me.

All Teachers a big thanks for the great help.

Extras:

GrassShader from Astro Kat Dev.

And thx to a lot other tutorials from Youtube.
